Leroy Gopal (a mụrụ na 6 Julaị 1979), bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa, onye na-eme ihe ụka ọchị na onye na-ese olu. A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri Yellow Card na Strike Back
A mụrụ ya n'abalị 6 ọnwa Julaị afọ 1979 na Harare, Zimbabwe. Mgbe Gopal dị afọ iri na anọ, nna ya nwụrụ
O nwere otu nwanne nwanyị okenye, Claudia Gopal Muvuti bụ onye bụbu onye nwere aha Iron Woman Zimbabwe.

Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ praịmarị na Blackiston Primary School na agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị na Gateway High School na Prince Edward Senior School. O nwere nzere BA (Honors) na Live Performance na Motion Picture site na AFDA, The School for the Creative Economy. Ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ akwụkwọ abụọ meriri ihe nrite M-NET Student Of The Year nke afọ 2003 na 2004 n'usoro.
Gopal lụrụ nwa agbọghọ South Africa, Keletso Molefe kemgbe afọ 2017. Di na nwunye ahụ mụrụ ụmụ atọ: Kiki Leroy Gopal, Didi Tadiwa, na Mimi Naima.
N'afọ 2000, o mere ihe nkiri mbụ ya na ihe nkiri Yellow Card ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye na-agba bọọlụ 'Tiyane Tsumba'
Site n'afọ 2006 ruo 2007, ọ rụrụ ọrụ 'Thabang Ngema' na SABC 3 soap opera One Way nke ghọrọ ihe a ma ama. N'afọ 2012, ọ pụtara na SABC 1 sitcom, Ses'Top La na ọrụ dịka 'Oleshe'

N'afọ 2013, ọ meriri ihe nrite maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na ọrụ na-atọ ọchị na South African Film and Television Awards maka ọrụ a. Site na ihe ịga nke ọma ma guzobe ya dịka onye na-eme ihe nkiri, e goro ya ka ọ rụọ ọrụ na usoro TV Mzansi Love: Kasi Style n'afọ 2013
Ọrụ ya bụ nwoke Kenya aha ya bụ 'Joshua Pembe'. O mekwara ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi Through the Flight of a feather nke e gosipụtara na Cannes Film Festival.
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ihe nkiri Seal Team 8 dịka onye ọchịchị aka ike nke Congo 'Tonga'
Mgbe ahụ, ọ pụtara na usoro TV Mzansi Magic na ọrụ 'Abomama' nke ghọrọ onye ama ama n'usoro ahụ. N'afọ 2014, ọ gbara egwu na usoro ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị SABC1 Ihawu le Sizwe
O mechara guzobe 'Creation Station Entertainment Company'
Leroy nyekwara ntụziaka vidiyo egwu Zimbabwe maka onye na-agụ egwu Audius Mtawarira.
